column5: Sorry no pics but buddy and I landed 2 fatty 38s trolling today. Both near humps  in 20-25 ft. 3 mph.  Believers. Deep setting. Crazy windy. Water is 50 F. Not many guys out.
Thanks for the report glad you had some action.
good stuff. Plan to head to St Clair tomorrow, hope we can find a couple!
Thanks for the update.  I am planning one more trip there - hopefully next week.
